### 提取章节：PROBLEM FORMULATION

#### 提取的实体：

```json
[
  {
    "algorithm_entity": {
      "algorithm_id": "Zhou2015_LogLinearModel",
      "entity_type": "Algorithm",
      "name": "Log-Linear Model",
      "title": "Learn to Solve Algebra Word Problems Using Quadratic Programming",
      "year": 2015,
      "authors": ["Lipu Zhou", "Shuaixiang Dai", "Liwei Chen"],
      "task": "Algebra Word Problem Solving",
      "dataset": ["Kushman2014_Dataset_2014"],
      "metrics": ["Accuracy_Classification"],
      "architecture": {
        "components": ["Feature Function", "Parameter Vector"],
        "connections": ["Template Selection", "Number Assignment"],
        "mechanisms": ["Max-Margin Objective"]
      },
      "methodology": {
        "training_strategy": ["Max-Margin Objective", "Quadratic Programming"],
        "parameter_tuning": ["Parameter Vector θ"]
      },
      "feature_processing": ["Feature Extraction"]
    }
  }
]
```

#### 提取的实体：

```json
[

    "algorithm_entity": {
      "algorithm_id": "Zhou2015_ConstraintGeneration",
      "entity_type": "Algorithm",
      "name": "Constraint Generation",
      "title": "Learn to Solve Algebra Word Problems Using Quadratic Programming",
      "year": 2015,
      "authors": ["Lipu Zhou", "Shuaixiang Dai", "Liwei Chen"],
      "task": "Algebra Word Problem Solving",
      "dataset": ["Kushman2014_Dataset_2014"],
      "metrics": ["Accuracy_Classification"],
      "architecture": {
        "components": ["Initial Model", "Constraints"],
        "connections": ["Model Training", "Constraint Checking"],
        "mechanisms": ["Iterative Constraint Addition"]
      },
      "methodology": {
        "training_strategy": ["Constraint Generation", "Quadratic Programming"],
        "parameter_tuning": ["Slack Variable ξ", "Parameter C"]
      },
      "feature_processing": ["Feature Extraction"]
    }
  }
]
```

### 提取章节：FEATURES

#### 提取的实体：

```json
[
  {
    "feature_entity": {
      "feature_id": "Zhou2015_SingleSlotFeatures",
      "entity_type": "Feature",
      "name": "Single Slot Features",
      "description": "Features describing individual number slots in the equation system templates.",
      "category": "Feature Extraction",
      "features": [
        "Relation between numbers and the question sentence",
        "Position of a number w.r.t a comparative word",
        "Context of a number",
        "Is one or two?",
        "Is a multiplier?",
        "Is between 0 and 1?"
      ]
    }
  },
  {
    "feature_entity": {
      "feature_id": "Zhou2015_SlotPairFeatures",
      "entity_type": "Feature",
      "name": "Slot Pair Features",
      "description": "Features describing relationships between pairs of number slots in the equation system templates.",
      "category": "Feature Extraction",
      "features": [
        "Relation between two numbers",
        "Context similarity between two numbers",
        "Coreference relationship",
        "Both multipliers",
        "Same sentence or continuous sentences",
        "Raw path and dependency path",
        "One number is larger than another"
      ]
    }
  },
  {
    "feature_entity": {
      "feature_id": "Zhou2015_SolutionFeatures",
      "entity_type": "Feature",
      "name": "Solution Features",
      "description": "Features describing properties of the solution.",
      "category": "Feature Extraction",
      "features": [
        "Is integer solution?",
        "Is positive solution?",
        "Is between 0 and 1?"
      ]
    }
  }
]
```

### 提取章节：EXPERIMENTS

#### 提取的实体：

```json
[
  {
    "metric_entity": {
      "metric_id": "CrossValidation_Accuracy",
      "entity_type": "Metric",
      "name": "Cross-Validation Accuracy",
      "description": "Average accuracy across multiple folds of cross-validation.",
      "category": "Classification Evaluation",
      "formula": "Sum of accuracies across folds / Number of folds"
    }
  },
  {
    "metric_entity": {
      "metric_id": "TrainingTime",
      "entity_type": "Metric",
      "name": "Training Time",
      "description": "Time taken to train the model.",
      "category": "Performance Evaluation",
      "formula": "Total time spent on training"
    }
  },
  {
    "metric_entity": {
      "metric_id": "FeatureExtractionTime",
      "entity_type": "Metric",
      "name": "Feature Extraction Time",
      "description": "Time taken to extract features.",
      "category": "Performance Evaluation",
      "formula": "Total time spent on feature extraction"
    }
  }
]
```

### 提取总结：

1. 刚刚提取的是 `PROBLEM FORMULATION`, `LEARNING AND INFERENCE`, `FEATURES`, 和 `EXPERIMENTS` 小节。
2. 论文中还有其他小节未被提取，包括 `DISCUSS`, `CONCLUSION AND FUTURE WORK`, 和 `ACKNOWLEDGMENTS`。
3. 下一个要提取的小节是 `DISCUSS`。

EXTRACTION_COMPLETE: false, CURRENT_SECTION: EXPERIMENTS, NEXT_SECTION: DISCUSS
